WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 23 MAR BY
   M/V RAMFORM TITAN TOWING 14 10000 METER
   CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   21-45.49S 039-41.27W, 21-45.55S 038-37.17W,
   22-12.53S 038-37.10W, 22-12.53S 038-22.85W,
   23-29.24S 038-22.92W, 23-29.10S 039-53.28W,
   22-01.24S 039-52.72W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 753/21.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 24 MAR 21.
